name: The Cold Night
description:
The Cold Night is a story-driven top down shooter with a silent protagonist, zombies, lots of pixelated blood and a horrific atmosphere.

Have been developed originally for Two Weeks Game 16 jam.

Enjoy.

Made with Unity engine.
Available languages: English, Russian Ambients used: 
music by BossLevelVGM
